issue.message: This call is to a method from API 28, the call containing class androidx.compose.ui.text.android.style.FontSpan is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 28. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(28) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(28).
